thread.title: Vatican Cricket Club to face Muslim XI
thread.title_full: Vatican Cricket Club to face Muslim XI | Sports | Saudi Gazette

author: saudigazette.com.sa
title: Vatican Cricket Club to face Muslim XI
text: VATICAN CITY — The Vatican’s increasingly high-profile cricket club has set the date for a highly symbolic first match against an all-Muslim team from Britain, organizers said Thursday. In a series of matches this month, the St. Peter’s Cricket Club, made up of mostly South Asian Rome-based seminarians and priests, will also take on a team from Pope Francis’s home town of Buenos Aires and get a chance of revenge against a Church of England XI. But it is the meeting with Mount Cricket Club from Batley, Yorkshire, on Oct. 17 that is likely to attract the most attention, with the Church hoping it will make a small contribution to global inter-faith understanding. — AFP
